page.title: 19Shopping in Newark
page.content: When a survey was taken on the shopping in Newark, both men and women were interviewed but the men felt they were unable to comment on the shopping facilities because they rarely do the shopping for their household. The general view was that there are a sufficient number of shops in most categories except clothes. Also more teenage shops are needed. The market is popular and is thought to be very well equipped with plenty of variety of stalls. Food is very cheap on the market. Most people prefer to use supermarkets and shop locally because it is convenient. The most popular shopping days are Wednesday, Friday & Saturday which are market days. Many shops close on Thursday afternoons and all but a few (newsagents, Halfords) are closed on Sunday.
